medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Short stature was noted shortly after birth with congenital ichthyosis diagnosed at that time. Delayed puberty was observed at age 30, with no infectious disease history during previous 16 years. Growth retardation was evaluated after moving to The Netherlands at age 16, with a significant drop in height SDS noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Congenital ichthyosis; history of hemorrhagic chicken pox at age 16; growth retardation.
medical_history.family_history: Parents and siblings are carriers of the STAT5b mutation.
medical_history.social_history: Emigrated to The Netherlands at age 16; noted no history of infectious diseases during follow-up.
